patthana15.81:1.1: Araṇaṁ parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.81:2.1: Araṇaṁ mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.81:3.1: Araṇaṁ appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
